title: Does anyone else have trouble maintaining their composure on board discussions?
body:
I'm honestly a fairly level and generally non-toxic person. 

In games I never (rarely ever) let people get under my skin, even when they are being ridiculous. 

And for the most part I try to be the same way here on the discussion boards. 

I like to be helpful for people who are asking for advice and will give feedback on ideas, .. things of that sort. 

But every now and then I find myself just being uncharacteristically toxic toward someone because they are just making ridiculous comments. 

It kind of bothers me actually. 

I know this is something that I need to work on, but I'm curious if anyone else has trouble with this.
